ygData.subject: Interesting poll
ygData.msgSnippet: This is off a spoiler site (everquest.gamestats.com). What is the Best Everquest Class? 15.9% Druid 10.6% Ranger 9.5% Cleric 8.6% Wizard 8.6% Shaman 7.5%
ygData.messageBody:
This is off a spoiler site (everquest.gamestats.com).

What is the Best Everquest Class?

15.9% Druid
10.6% Ranger
9.5% Cleric
8.6% Wizard
8.6% Shaman
7.5% Necromancer
6.6% Paladin
6.4% Monk
6.2% Magician
5.6% Enchanter
5% Bard
3.6% Warrior
2.8% Rogue
2.5% Shadowknight

Total Votes: 2273

Considering druids, rangers, shamen, clerics, monks, and bards
seem to be the classes who complain the least, I thought it
was interesting that we ended up so low on this poll. I also
suspect a lot of people are voting based on what they've seen
(no way would I rank magician below wizard - a L20 mage
letting his pet tank while he meditated was easily mowing
through orcs I was barely able to fight one on one at L24),
rather than what they've played. Would be interesting to see
how these percentages compare to the numbers of each class on
the servers.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
